name: Poltergoose
description:
Stranded in a strange sea, you must obey the rules of your avian overlords. Collect as many ducks as you can and deliver them to the great golden duck. Sometimes your engine may stall. Be careful when you try to restart it, strange spirits lurk down there.

Your flashlight is your friend. Hold left-click to power it up--this will help you survive when needed. It is recommended that you collect all 11 ducks before proceeding to the end.

Poltergoose was made in 72 hours for a game jam and can be completed in about 10 minutes (it has received some minor updates since then).

Controls:

  • E - interact
  • F - flashlight (hold left-click to power it up)
  • WASD - move
  • Space - jump
